it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.board

Class AdjacentMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.EnumMap<CardinalDirection,SquareConnection>
        • it.polimi.deib.se2019.sanp4.adrenaline.model.board.AdjacentMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<CardinalDirection,SquareConnection>

    public class AdjacentMap
extends EnumMap<CardinalDirection,SquareConnection>
implements Serializable
    A class describing the connection between squares in the board. It is unique for each square and represents how it is connected to the surrounding squares. It holds an internal mapping of the adjacent squares of a square for all the cardinal directions and provides methods to retrieve adjacent squares. If there is no adjacent square in a given direction, the value is set to null in this map.
    Author:
    Alessandro Fulgini, Lorenzo Farinelli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void setConnection(CardinalDirection direction,
                          CoordPair square,
                          SquareConnectionType connectionType)
        Sets the connection in a specified direction.
        Parameters:
        direction - The cardinal direction, not null
        square - The coordinates of the adjacent square in that direction
        connectionType - The connection type with the adjacent square

      • getConnection

        public SquareConnection getConnection(CardinalDirection direction)
        Returns the connection in the specified direction, null if there is no adjacent square.
        Parameters:
        direction - The cardinal direction, not null
        Returns:
        If there is an adjacent square, returns the connection; if there is no adjacent square returns null
